main.title: Chose the Best Social Media UI Design in Your Mind!
main.t:
If you had Elon Musk Money,
And you suddenly want to buy
YouTube, FaceBook, Instagram and Dcard,
whitch is the four most commonly used social media in Taiwan,
Then put them all together
and make a social media that is just for you!
main.t2:
Next, you will pass a few simple quizzes to determine
what the best-looking social media style
looks like in your mind.
At the same time,
these data will be returned to our database
to help us calculate
the most popular social media styles in Taiwan in 2022

about-us.title: Auout us
about-us.t:
躺平少年團 TP young 創立於 2022 年 10 月，由台北大學數位行銷學程的兩位學生領導，致力於研究社群、行銷以及網際網路。

雖然在這個嚴峻的時代，經濟壓的每個年輕人都喘不過氣，導致大家都想要躺平，但躺平之餘，我們也想做出一些事情來證明我們，為社會做出微薄的貢獻，並將我們的足跡留在網路上。

我們的使命就是讓世界可以因為有我們，而有一點小小的變化。

title.t: Contains title and some function buttons.

content.t: Contains the content of this app.

nav.t: Contains some buttons to help user go to the page whitch thay want to go.
